external_games.name: ElePass: Only Elephants Can Unlock the Passcode

name: ElePass: Only Elephants Can Unlock the Passcode
summary: This is an action puzzle game for 1 to 2 players that can be played on a single smartphone. You play as the main character, an elephant who has picked up a smartphone, using a finger shaped like an elephant's trunk. There are also special elephant rings to set the mood.

videos.name: Gameplay Trailer
videos.title: ElePass Only Elephants Can Unlock the Passcode
